contactUsModal.name: Your name

hero.text1: The Fontanelle farmhouse offers all its clients splendid accomodations completed with kitchen and fireplace positioned on the imolesi hills at a few kilometres from Castel del Rio.
hero.text2: Holidays and Relax , Wine and food tours , contact with nature , Golf Canoeing and Mountain Bike , Festivals and Events.
hero.text3: Art , Medieval feasts , Local Crafts , The vein of gypsum.
hero.text4: From an ancient stone farmhouse four apartments are derived from 4 - 5 persons and , in the old barn adjacent to the house, two apartments for 2 persons.
hero.text5: Types of animals u can find here... Since we love animals, we accept them! We are on dogwelcome.it
